name: Hubbard Track Homesteads
description: A residential stretch of Hubbard Track, where the untamed spirit of childhood still briefly asserts itself. You are on Hubbard Track. A few kids are kicking at dust or chasing a stray dog, their shouts and laughter a fleeting counterpoint to the quiet struggle of the frontier. They pause, briefly, their eyes holding a mixture of curiosity and mild annoyance at the interruption. Hubbard Track continues its arduous journey to the north and south, a rutted path through sparse settlements. The air is still, broken only by the distant creak of a wagon wheel and the occasional chirp of a desert bird, oblivious to the subtle grit of the west.
